entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1400 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Snow level 1500 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
